 2017-13672017-11-09,  PCH,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Race Relations Foundation Act
PrecisAppointment of ORLANDO BOWEN of Brampton, Ontario, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Race Relations Foundation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, on a part-time basis, effective December 15, 2017.
